title: 03 - Wildlife Trade Hotline
headline: Elephant Rescued from Illegal Trade
description: An elephant was saved from illegal poachers thanks to a tip-off from the hotline. Authorities were able to intervene in time.

title: 03 - Wildlife Trade Hotline
headline: Endangered Tiger Saved
description: A Bengal tiger cub was rescued after being spotted in a local market. The hotline played a vital role in mobilizing swift action.

title: 03 - Wildlife Trade Hotline
headline: Exotic Birds Freed
description: Several exotic birds were freed from illegal captivity. The rescue was made possible due to reports from concerned citizens.
